data.name: Rico-Jump: Support The Developer Faces
data.detailed_description:
Rico-Jump is and will always be a free game.

With this DLC you get two animated faces for your robot to show off in multiplayer-matches as well as in your home-screen.
  • Animated Smiley-Face, which bounces up an down
  • Animated stars, displaying the bright star that you are <3

Additionally, by buying this DLC you support the developer of this game, which I highly appreciate. =)

data.supported_languages:
English*, German
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 3200G
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 3100X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon 460
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
